name: IAS Academy in delhi
short_description:
Chanakya IAS Academy focuses on inculcating administrative traits in candidates in addition to comprehensive teaching of the prescribed syllabus. The academy organizes seminars and workshops with the help of civil servants and experts in soft skills and train aspirants to think, feel and express themselves like administrators. Only a manageable number of students are enrolled in a batch so that each student gets the personal attention of teachers. A good modern infrastructure with library is maintained. The Academy has pan India presence with eight well established centres; two in Delhi, one each at Ahmadabad, Jaipur, Pune, Chandigarh, Ranchi and Hazaribagh. Shortly good number of centres will be established in different parts of the country.
Contact us: Chanakya IAS Academy, South Delhi Center, 124, 2nd floor, Satya Niketan, Opp. Venky College, Near: Dhaula Kuan, New Delhi - 21 
Ph.: 011-64504615, 011-65428647
summary: Chanakya IAS Academy has been offering educational services
